title: why lol?
body: Ok here is what happened, i was playing a lol solo/duo game in champion select and a player named "[REMOVED]"  got support and demanded top and i was thinking "another auto fill oh well" this person then decides to first pick war wick as a support so i look at his match history and see he is a troll so i decided to dodge for the team to save them from losing lp then i go to find i get a 30 min penalty and lost 10 lp. why do i get the harsh penalty when i was saving the team from a troll so now i am really angry. can i get any support or riot do something about this please i would rather not lose every game because we can't dodge when we have a troll on our team killing the game for the wrest of us.

replies.body: The loss is required to stop people from getting 100% win rates and farming challenger.

yeah but that still doesn't mean we shouldn't have the option to report a player during champ select.

Though I must admit that would cause problems for players who play offfmeta stuff or refuse to pick a champion they don't play to make a synergy happen (if you pick yasou in ranked, whilst I will probably pick a knockup, I shouldn't be forced to, you have to be self sufficient with your knockup).

Get used to it mate, that's how it is these days. I have been barraged with them too. Only a few games a go a guy locked into jungle AFTER the jungler had first picked. It was the original junglers series too. We did end up winning with 2 jungles but the ADC AFkd most the game and we got super lucky they had a DC late. This is what it's coming to these days, drives me insane because the game is technically perfect. The issues with it is based on the community 100% - nothing else. Unlucky about the -10lp :(

Doesn't really matter. You should think of it this way. 
Would you rather lose 10lp, take a 30 minute time penalty and keep your current mmr? 
Or lose 19lp, play a game that makes you want to kys and also lose mmr?

note: mmr determines how much lp you gain from each win. For example if you have a high mmr you gain 21 lp if you win and lose 16 lp if you lose.
 If you have a low mmr you gain 16lp per win and lose 21lp if you lose.
